nifreeze.viz package

Submodules

nifreeze.viz.signals module

Visualizing signals and intermediate aspects of models.

nifreeze.viz.signals.calculate_sphere_pts(points, center)[source]

Calculate the location of each point when it is expanded out to the sphere.

nifreeze.viz.signals.compute_dmri_convex_hull(s, dirs, mask=None)[source]

Compute the convex hull of the dMRI signal s.

nifreeze.viz.signals.plot_correlation(x, y, title)[source]
nifreeze.viz.signals.plot_error(kfolds: list[int], mean: numpy.ndarray, std_dev: numpy.ndarray, xlabel: str, ylabel: str, title: str, color: str = 'orange', figsize: tuple[float, float] = (19.2, 10.8)) → matplotlib.figure.Figure[source]

Plot the error and standard deviation.

Parameters

  • kfolds (list) – Number of k-folds.

  • mean (ndarray) – Mean RMSE values.

  • std_dev (ndarray) – Standard deviation values.

  • xlabel (str) – X-axis label.

  • ylabel (str) – Y-axis label.

  • title (str) – Plot title.

  • color (str, optional) – Plot color.

  • figsize (tuple, optional) – Figure size.

Returns

Matplotlib figure object.

Return type

Figure

nifreeze.viz.signals.plot_estimation_carpet(gt_nii, gp_nii, gtab, suptitle, **kwargs)[source]
nifreeze.viz.signals.plot_prediction_surface(y, y_pred, S0, y_dirs, y_pred_dirs, title, cmap)[source]

Plot the prediction surface obtained by computing the convex hull of the predicted signal data, and plot the true data as a scatter plot.

nifreeze.viz.signals.plot_signal_data(y, ax)[source]

Plot the data provided as a scatter plot
